Autonomy : When we Act, we do so [[Volition|Volitionally]] [!ques] Question What are you doing to build volition and not just provide freedom? ^58e09b [!ex] An Example Your parents could ground you in your bedroom and you can rearrange/decorate your room however you want, but if what you actually want to do in that moment is go out and play with your friends you do not have autonomy.

item.title: Volition
item.description: Status : #ideas Tags : Link : [[Player Autonomy]] Volition Volition isn’t independence or freedom to do whatever you want, it is wanting to do the things that you are doing. 1. Volition Building The key is NOT to just offer more. It is to offer a density of things that matter Leading games aren’t about freedom. They use ingredients of meaningful choice, growth, mastery and narrative to brew volition.
